user_review: Another marvelous meal today !A light seafood broth with a hint of fresh mint smoothes your palate for the delicacies to come ...The delicacy this time were sweetbreads flambé. How to describe these tender morsels with a slightly crunchy crust in a smooth creamy sauce ? Exceptional !!!
The best place for seafood tapas. Portions are generous, so come hungry. Exceptional service from the staff.

Went at this place for a private party for my friend's birthday.  A lot of great food!  Everything you're expecting from a Portuguese restaurant but with a Spanish-Tapas touch!Chicken was very good and so were the sardines and various seafood salads!Enjoy!

Really enjoyable options for lunch. Good quality though portions are a bit too large - they harm my afternoon productivity!!! Guess I should have discipline to pack up leftovers ;-) Looking forward to trying this place for dinner as well.
Good food but GLACIAL service. Hours to get your dinner. We waited 40 minutes for two scallops and the place wasn't even crowded.

This is a great place for a romantic dinner. Great wine and cocktails. The service was awesome and the decor is warm and quaint. The food was delicious. They serve mainly seafood but have other selections as well. Get the half baked cookie for dessert!

Went here to catch a soccer game, they weren't open but others were in there.  Fantastic fun.  Decided to eat there, had cod fritters, crudo, octopus, and scallops!  Spectacular!  The chef was sure friendly, learned a lot from him regarding food and Portugal.  Great experience, will definitely be returning when back in Montreal.

We discovered this place with a voucher - but would definitely go back.Food : very tasty. The ingredients are of good quality. We ordered the octopus, chorizo, mussels as appetizers and they were all very satisfying. The main dishes are well seasoned and the portions are perfect.I'd suggest the typical Portuguese dessert served in a verrine - exquisite.Their wine list is short, but definitely delivers.Service : our waitress was very attentive and took good care of us. Service was A+Decor : very simple and modern. Friendly-romantic atmosphere This place is appropriate for both small and large groups.
The meat was terribly hard. The cappacio was lacking flavor. The bread was not fresh. I would not recommend this restaurant .

Ended up going to Boca Ibercia by chance. Waiter was always there to serve...he was exceptionally friendly and recommended a red wine that turned out to be fantastic. we decided to go with a few tapas instead of ordering main dishes super great idea the octopus was very very good and tender the rapini was fantastic and the stuffed calmar was nice. the atmosphere was very friendly and deafened we will be paying another visit  to Boca Ibercia. I recommend the restaurant and there's a nice terrace.
